resources.string: Assign a tag to the image
This is an app to tag photos in your gallery.
We are a bunch of developers who want to solve problems using technology.

In this increasingly digital world, are you worried about your privacy? Are you in a constant frenzy about losing your personal data to companies and other apps? We provide you an image tagging application that can categorize images without transferring any photos out of your phone.

Mipsa Patel 
 Sneha Manohar 
 Tilak S. Naik 
 Vibha A. Karanth
